title: Jungler B5 looking for team to climb.
body:
Bronze 5 Jungler looking for players to climb with!

Bronze 5 Jungle main but also a decent Top laner and ADC, silver 1 last season had a rough time this year tho, sreious, enjoy playing competitive and love to talk during a match using skype so i can make calls or plays/be directed if im not playing to a reasonable standard. Never flame never get salty and always keep my cool. if this interests you hmu in game but please dont be a raging salt monster. i play a lot during the day and at night as well

-ThreshXG

replies.body: Yo, add me GORDONNODROG Im S5 atm, Top and Jungle main. Looking to climb as well. :)
feel free to add me, im currently in b3 trying to climb.
feel free to add me, im curently in bronze 3
